siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
blogPost.body: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
blogPost.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
blogPost.author: John Kellett

localize.description: 对于任何想要改善健康和实现目标的人来说，HistoricalMe应用程序是你的私人在线空间，可以方便地记录和跟踪你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用这款日记应用了解更多关于你的信息。
對於任何想要改善健康和實現目標的人來說，HistoricalMe應用程序是你的私人在線空間，可以方便地記錄和跟蹤你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用這款日記應用瞭解更多關於你的信息。

previous.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
previous.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android

localize.description: “每一天，事情都会变得容易一些。但你必须每天都去做，这是最难的部分。”每天帮助你将目标分解成我们每天可以执行的任务，在形成新习惯的同时，给我们美丽的黑板涂上色彩，最终实现我们的目标。
localize.tagline: 简单美观的网络、iOS和Android习惯跟踪器

localize.description: “每一天，事情都會變得容易一些。但你必須每天都去做，這是最難的部分。”每天幫助你將目標分解成我們每天可以執行的任務，在形成新習慣的同時，給我們美麗的黑板塗上色彩，最終實現我們的目標。
localize.tagline: 簡單美觀的網絡、iOS和Android習慣跟蹤器

next.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
next.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit

localize.description: 让写作成为一种习惯。在接下来的90天里，每天至少写10分钟。每天用#90DaysOfProse 标签推特你的进展。
讓寫作成爲一種習慣。在接下來的90天裏，每天至少寫10分鐘。每天用#90DaysOfProse 標籤推特你的進展。
